name: comic-library-utilities
description: Comic Utils is a collection of tools for processing and organizing comic book files. It includes renaming, sorting, and conversion utilities for personal collections and supports multiple file formats.
features: Batch Processing: Rename and organize multiple comic files at once. Save hours of manual work.
Format Conversion: Convert between different comic book formats easily. Universal compatibility.
Smart Sorting: Automatically organize comics by series and issue number. Perfect library structure.
Multi-Format Support: Works with CBZ, CBR, PDF, and more. Handle any comic format.
Command-Line Tools: Powerful utilities for automation and scripting. Integrate into your workflow.
Personal Collections: Designed for managing home comic libraries. Keep your collection pristine.
